name: Spin Bomb
description:
Shoot the bomb to target zone! make the line in one color!
If you shoot area other than target zone, everything will be explored! BOOM!

* Simple game play that everyone can enjoy!
* Use combo system to earn more coins!
* Over 30 cute & bizarre bombs!
* So simple!
Quick into the game play! Do not need to sign in and any other unnecessary steps!
Do NOT need network connection! Do NOT worry about your data issue!
Even airplane, you can enjoy the game!
